notesStmt.note: Lower margin of the last 20 folios damaged. Stained.
A number of notes in a different hand than the bulk of the manuscript, e.g. folios 2r, 3r, 8r, 13r, 37r, etc.).
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Portions of a collection of piyutim belonging to the Sefardi (North African) rite.

collation.p: Quires of mostly 8 leaves each. Catchwords at the end of the quires.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Oriental square and semi-cursive script, punctuated, of the 15th century.
